name: Meg's Tailoring
overview:
Megan Kenny has decades of experience in dressmaking and has gained valuable experience working in London, Sydney and Auckland. This company based in Auckland focuses on providing customers with the very best alteration and dressmaking services.

The success of this business and high demand led Megan to move her business location to a larger premise in Newmarket and open two more stores in the City and North Shore. The team at Meg’s Tailoring aims to provide excellent service to every client backed with extensive experience. Meg’s Tailoring services include alterations, mending, restyling, dressmaking and bridal wear.

Meg’s Tailoring has specialized consultants to ensure customers expert advice they can rely on. The tailors at Meg’s Tailoring are dedicated to transforming a perfect outfit into the perfect fit. The staff understands how precious some garments can be and take a personal interest in mending or altering clients cared for possessions. They also are skilled with altering soft furnishings, curtains and bed coverings. If clients have a specific outfit in mind they would like to create, Meg’s Tailoring has the experience, tools and techniques to make their vision a reality.
